subject: Productivity
title: Hustle Culture and Its Backlash
description: A quick, practical guide to Hustle Culture and Its Backlash.

hook.text: Rise and grind. Sleep when you're dead. Hustle culture turned exhaustion into a badge of honor.

buildup.text: Silicon Valley glamorized overwork in the 2010s. Working 80-hour weeks became a bragging right.

discovery.text: Research shows that productivity drops sharply after 50 hours a week. Beyond 55, it collapses.

twist.text: Burnout rates soared. The WHO classified burnout as an occupational phenomenon in 2019.

climax.text: A growing anti-hustle movement argues that rest, boundaries, and health are the real productivity hacks.

quiz.question: What happens to productivity after 50 hours of work per week?
